title: Orangutan
description:
An orangutan, the orange-haired ape with long arms. Depicted facing forward, with a long broad face and sitting with its legs bent. Occasionally shown scratching its head. Color varies across platforms, ranging from orange to light brown.

This emoji is considered racist in some contexts, particularly when used to disparage, insult, and abuse people with dark skin, especially Black people.
apple_vendor_description: This vibrant orangutan emoji, as seen on Apple devices, is a testament to Appleâ€™s detailed character design, featuring rich, reddish-brown fur rendered with soft, inviting gradients.  Its expressive face, with gentle, intelligent eyes and a slightly rounded snout, is brought to life by Appleâ€™s signature realistic lighting and subtle 3D shading.  The orangutan often symbolizes intelligence, playfulness, conservation efforts, or a connection to nature, making it a warm and engaging addition to digital conversations.
